reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 146/10: PUBLIC BODIES AND COMMISSION PUBLIC BODIES - DEFINITIONS
reg_info.reg_name_text: Public Bodies and Commission Public Bodies — Definitions
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 146/10: PUBLIC BODIES AND COMMISSION PUBLIC BODIES - DEFINITIONS

content.content: 1. Each body that is listed in Column 1 of Table 1 is prescribed as a public body for the purposes of the Act.  O. Reg. 146/10, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. Each body that is listed in Column 1 of Table 1 is prescribed as a public body for the purposes of the Act.  O. Reg. 146/10, s. 1.

content.content: 2. A public body that is listed in Column 1 of Table 1 is prescribed as a Commission public body for the purposes of the Act if so indicated in the corresponding row in Column 2. O. Reg. 286/16, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 2. A public body that is listed in Column 1 of Table 1 is prescribed as a Commission public body for the purposes of the Act if so indicated in the corresponding row in Column 2. O. Reg. 286/16, s. 1.

content.content: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 146/10, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (revokes other Regulations).  O. Reg. 146/10, s. 3.
